attributes.action: Legislate that all councils should have crime reporting pods available in their areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pods have been developed whereby an individual can report a crime anonymously if they feel uneasy about going to the police.  For example, homophobic assault.  I am not suggesting people should not go to the police but that statistics would be more accurately maintained if all crimes were recorded.
